thread.title: "I am totally opposed to domestic violence of any kind": Trump

title: "I am totally opposed to domestic violence of any kind": Trump
text:
"I am totally opposed to domestic violence of any kind": Trump 1:30am IST - 00:34 
U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday he is opposed to domestic violence, speaking out on the matter a week after top aide Rob Porter resigned under the weight of allegations from two former wives that he committed domestic abuse. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
